column4: any clues on how to list the hardware specs in gnome or in a terminal?
like, whether this machine has 2 processors or one (can't shut it off to find out and dmesg didn't help)
i dunno, but i'd be surprised if DRI was supported over SSH...?
: this error was not there in dapper.
that's xserver-xorg, and it won't remove much i'm afraid
: with autoremove it will, for those packages were indirectly isntalled
i'm not going to try that, but i doubt it... removing ubuntu-desktop won't make autoremove remove anything else
thijs : to ensure the shot, do a dpkg-quer -W --showformat='${Package}\t${Status}\n' | grep "ok installed" | grep "xserver" | less
: I bet, kubuntu works and ubuntu fails at putting my laptop to sleep
sort of the opposite for me :)
: I wish it worked in both
